residency_requirements: Applicants must accumulate at least 1,095 days of residence in Canada within four years preceding their application.
procedural_fairness: Judicial review of the Citizenship Judge's decision based on procedural fairness and adequacy of reasons.
decision_outcome: Decision set aside; case returned for reconsideration.
standard_of_review: The decision was unreasonable due to unclear reasoning and unresolved issues.
document_authenticity: Applicant's failure to meet residency requirements and ambiguous documentation.
